name: Vector 36 Racewear - Stratus One / Plateau
detailed_description:
Customize your pilot with this Vector 36 DLC racewear set.

Adapted from the Sub-orbital transport dockers, The Stratus One is designed for high heat and speed scenarios.

Helmet - Stratus One
Race Suit - Plateau

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: i5 or equivelent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Direct X 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: i5 or equivelent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: i5 or equivelent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB card
